commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Thanks for helping me carry all of the stuff, Kotori! I know it's not much, but here's a strawberry parfait for your hard work. Go on and eat up!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Oh, thanks! It's really no big deal. A friend in need is a friend indeed, right? I know you'd do the same.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: You really were a lifesaver. If you didn't come by when you did, I probably would've collapsed from exhaustion.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: You'd need a forklift to carry all of these veggies on your own! I wish I could've been around earlier to help you out.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: No, you were more than helpful! Look, the parfait's gonna melt if we keep chatting! Let's dig in!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Right! I'll help myself, then!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Mmm! This is so tasty!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Giggle* I'm gonna help myself, too.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Mmhmm! The chocolate parfait is good too!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: So by the way, why were you carrying all those vegetables?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I was performing a show in the shopping district just now and got them as a kind of thank you. They're apparently prized organic veggies... But what do I do with them all?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Hmm... Oh, I know! How about hotpot? You can eat up a bunch of vegetables if you make hotpot.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Hotpot, huh? I've never made it before.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Then let's have a hotpot party where everyone helps to make it! Now let me think... With all of those veggies, how does a tomato hotpot sound?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: A hotpot party! That sounds like so much fun! Let's do it!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Thanks for coming to my super-exciting, heart-pounding tomato hotpot party, everyone!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: What?! For one's heart to pound when eating hotpot, it must mean you are brewing up a dark hotpot of the night to summon Lucifer! I'm impressed, Emma!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Ugh, for crying out loud. Did you not hear her mention it was a tomato hotpot? The lengths you go to hide your excitement over being invited, Yoshiko. Honestly.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I'm not Yoshiko, I'm Yohane! And who said anything about me being excited, huh?!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: I took all of the ingredients to the cafeteria!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: *Chuckle* It's like a home ec class.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Is this gonna turn out good? Rina-chan Board says, "Woo-hoo!"

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: They're supposed to be quality organic veggies so I just know they'll be yummy!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm looking forward to it.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: What kinds of vegetables do you have?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Let me see... I've got tomatoes, zucchinis, pumpkins, cabbages, onions, carrots, bell peppers, eggplants, turnips, and celery. There are a LOT of tomatoes!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Wow, that's a lot of vegetables. Prepping them up is gonna take a while, so let's get into it.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Hey, how are we gonna finish off our hotpot meal?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: We were having a lengthy debate on the way here about whether to make risotto or pasta with the leftover hotpot.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Oh no! There's no right answer to that one.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Hmm... I want to eat them both.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I'm with Rina! Let's make them both!
